overview.summary: Convert Analyze data to the NRRD format which can be used in SCIRun networks.

description.p: This module provides support for converting Analyze data to the NRRD format which can be used in SCIRun networks. An important point is that this module is dependent on the Insight package, so both the Teem and Insight packages have to be enabled in the SCIRun build in order for the AnalyzeNrrdReader converter to work.

Some brief background information about the Analyze format will be helpful in understanding how to load data using the AnalyzeNrrdReader reader. For a detailed description of the Analyze format, please refer to the documentation pages for Analyze.

Analyze files contain volume data, often from MRI. The Analyze format includes two different files for each volume: a header (extension ".hdr") file and and image (extension ".img") file. All of the image data for a volume is contained in a single image file. Since these files come in pairs, the AnalyzeNrrdReader module requires the user to specify a ".hdr" file to read. Then the module looks for the corresponding ".img" file in the same directory as the ".hdr" file.

The AnalyzeNrrdReader module requires the user to specify a directory containing the data files. One or more Analyze files may be selected for processing. If the files are recognized as valid Analyze format, they are read in and converted to the NRRD format which can then be passed downstream to certain other SCIRun modules.
